alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:50PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Albany and south central Converse Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 549 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Windy Peak, or 36 miles southwest of Douglas, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Friend Park Campground, Esterbrook, Windy Peak and Laramie Peak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range; Shirley Basin
